content: गयः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the people living round Gayā and the district inhabited by them. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of an Asura. {@--3@} Wealth. {@--4@} House, household, family. {@--5@} Offspring, progeny. {@--6@} The sky. {@--7@} One's own place or abode. --या <ab>N.</ab> of a city in Behar which is a place of pilgrimage.
